title.native: アリス・ギア・アイギス Expansion

description:
Centuries ago, mankind abandoned planet Earth after the Vice, a race of mechanical aliens, drove them from their home into a life adrift in space. Now resigned to starships forged of pieces of Earth’s shattered moon, the final hope for humanity lies in the hands of Actresses, young women born with the ability to wield the only weapons that can harm the Vice: Alice Gears, mechanical suits that can finally turn the tide against the alien incursion.

(Source: HIDIVE)

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Outdoor Activities
tags.description: Centers around hiking, camping or other outdoor activities.

tags.name: Fitness
tags.description: Centers around exercise with the aim of improving physical health.

tags.name: Space
tags.description: Partly or completely set in outer space.

tags.name: Tokusatsu
tags.description: Prominently features elements that resemble special effects in Japanese live-action shows

tags.name: Airsoft
tags.description: Centers around the sport of airsoft.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

title.native: アリス・ギア・アイギス ～ドキッ！アクトレスだらけのマーメイドグランプリ♥～

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/humikane)

The original designer behind the popular mecha musume genre (now trademarked by Fumikane), he takes combinations of bishoujo and war machines and made it his well-recognized art form. So far, besides Mecha Musume, he has designed toy designs for Busou Shinki toy line by Konami, and the popular anime series Sky Girls and Strike Witches, the former also from Konami.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/humikane)

The original designer behind the popular mecha musume genre (now trademarked by Fumikane), he takes combinations of bishoujo and war machines and made it his well-recognized art form. So far, besides Mecha Musume, he has designed toy designs for Busou Shinki toy line by Konami, and the popular anime series Sky Girls and Strike Witches, the former also from Konami.

**Height:** 147 cm
**Hobbies:** Singing, drawing, watching anime

[Website](https://suzukiaina.jp/) | [Profile (IAM Agency)](http://iamagency.sukurepo.jp/actors/women/suzuki_aina) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/aina_suzuki723) | [Agency Twitter](https://twitter.com/AinaSuzuki_Info) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpNypDVlaMyJDx7P8u3dd-A)

She debuted as a voice actress in 2014. She is also skilled in the Minyou (民謡) genre, which is a genre of traditional Japanese music, where she won many competitions.

__Non-anime roles:__
- Sakawa - Azur Lane (VG)

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).
